ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: not reading environment variables
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [x] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? create .env file and add the following line "PORT=80" start nocodb (npm start OR ./nocodb) ### Desired Behavior application starts with port 80 ### Project Details I am running nocodb 0.107.0 binary downloaded from github ### Attachments _No response_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: read env file closes #5673 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
